The Thai: language caption of the post translates to English as "When Uncle Tu was a young man, he was very handsome and rich." Uncle Tu is a nickname for Prayuth Chan-Ocha, the current Thai prime minister.
Two of the photos in the post were share: 4. Google reverse image searches revealed that the three photos purportedly showing the young Prayuth were digitally manipulated. Additionally, comparison screenshots were provided to demonstrate the differences between the misleading images and the genuine photos published by reputable sources such as a Thai lifestyle magazine, the Royal Thai Government's website, and a local Thai news website.
